column5: Bookings available from Aug 19th, 2017. You are booking two modern private room's in a two story house. Located near major highways, restaurants, grocery stores, Texas star golf course, parks, AT&T stadium, and just 10 min to DFW airport. My space is in between Dallas and Fort Worth. Hence, great for interns, travel workers, students (15 min to UT Arlington), business travelers, and even for adventurers. Short-term and Long-term discounts.
column8: Two Private Rooms Gated Community Near DFW Airport
